short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace the user's default new tab page with a new better one

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browsing experience with Focus - light weight extension that turns your new tab page into an inspiring, relaxing and customizable hub that helps with Your productivity.

With Focus it is easy to organize quick links, and enhance your productivity with calming wallpapers and a sleek, minimalist design. 

Focus will keep you inspired and motivated every time you open a new tab.
